data.text:
@CTVNews I see a thread that just copies itself. What a waste. 
She’s been through so much. 😞
@MurraySimpson7 @CTVNews Should we? You’re the people we SHOULDNT give a crap whether you’re here or NOT! Get over yourself. You ARE what’s wrong with the world
@Richard23338147 @CTVNews Idiot!!! Stop with the thumb scrolling (or otherwise 🙄) on Twitter and get a LIFE! All people matter when DEATH is involved you a**!!
@LohnJennon3 @LifeIsAPlay_ @CTVNews No, I don't but you do. Now go away
@gordieman2 @LifeIsAPlay_ @CTVNews My friend already died, so not sure how “fine” he will be. 🤦🏻

@tml468 @LifeIsAPlay_ @CTVNews How exactly am I on a pedestal?  If anything, you think a celebrity who got COVID after her celebrity husband died from COVID is on a pedestal. Pathetic, really. Tell the doctor how hearing this news hurt you.
@LifeIsAPlay_ @CTVNews I think you wanted to tell Twitter that you don’t care about a woman with COVID. Well congratulations, we heard you. Do you feel better now?
@Hugh_Janus87 @brooker32 @mollyrules @CTVNews I’m talking about when you said thank god he didn’t have Covid lol
@CTVNews Thank you for letting us all know🤡
